query.queryString:
#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| proto=tcp local_resp=true
| groupby(id.resp_p) | sort(id.resp_p, reverse=false)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| local_orig=false local_resp=false
| count()
//| table([@timestamp, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, proto], order=@timestamp, limit=100)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| local_orig=true local_resp=false
| count()
//| table([@timestamp, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, proto], order=@timestamp, limit=100)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| local_orig=false local_resp=true
| count()
//| table([@timestamp, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, proto], order=@timestamp, limit=100)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| local_orig=true local_resp=true
| count()
//| table([@timestamp, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, proto], order=@timestamp, limit=100)

#path=conn local_resp=true
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| groupby([id.resp_h, id.resp_p, service])
| groupby(service)
| sort(service, reverse=false)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| proto=udp local_resp=true
| groupby(id.resp_p) | sort(id.resp_p, reverse=false)

widgets.title: Top Inbound Data Flows by Originator

query.queryString:
#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| groupby([id.orig_h],
          function=[sum(resp_bytes, as=resp_bytes_sum),
                    count(as=number_of_conns)])
| eval(Gigabytes=(((resp_bytes_sum/1024)/1024)/1000)) | format("%.2f", field=Gigabytes, as=Gigabytes)
| table([id.orig_h, number_of_conns, Gigabytes]) | sort(Gigabytes, limit=20)

widgets.title: Top Outbound Data Flows by Originator

query.queryString:
#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| groupby([id.orig_h],
          function=[sum(orig_bytes, as=orig_bytes_sum),
                    count(as=number_of_conns)])
| eval(Gigabytes=(((orig_bytes_sum/1024)/1024)/1000)) | format("%.2f", field=Gigabytes, as=Gigabytes)
| table([id.orig_h, number_of_conns, Gigabytes]) | sort(Gigabytes, limit=20)

#path=conn
| (proto=tcp OR (proto=udp AND orig_pkts>0 AND resp_pkts>0))
| conn_state != "S0"
| groupby([id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, proto],
          function=[sum(resp_bytes, as=resp_bytes_sum),
                    sum(orig_bytes, as=orig_bytes_sum),
                    count(as=number_of_conns)])
| eval(total_bytes=orig_bytes_sum+resp_bytes_sum)
| sort(total_bytes, limit=20)
| rdns(id.resp_h)
